about_the_game:
Who's the Chicken?!
Introducing a party game that measures your fear level!
Online battles for up to 10 players!
More than 30 mini-games to test your courage!

Do you have the guts to take on the challenge?

Three Battle Modes to Determine the Chicken
Chicken☆Trials (Single Player Mode)
This is the main mode with replayability. Aim for the highest rating, COOL, in over 30 mini-games!

Chickempic (Online Battle)
Public Chickempic
Match randomly with players from all over the country. By playing 'Public Chickempic,' you can earn ranking points and compete with players nationwide.

Private Chickempic
Match with people who know the password and compete with up to 10 players. You can also select the mini-games you want to play.

Friend Chickempic
Match with players registered as friends and compete with up to 10 players. You can also select the mini-games you want to play.

Chicken☆Life
Check your fear level for today.

Over 30 Mini-Games to Measure Fear!
- The Guillotine
- Love Potion
- Perfect Noodles
- Magic Soda
- Kiss Game
- Flightless bird
- Samurai Carpenter
- Flying Juliet
- Full Throttle
- Unstoppable
… and many more!
Let's find out who the real Chicken is!

Other Important Information
Prohibited Actions
Using icons or usernames that are against public order and morals in this app is prohibited according to the terms of use. Players found violating this will face measures such as account suspension. If you encounter such users, please use the "Block" function. Blocked player information will be reviewed by the management team. To block a player, press the "Friend" button from the mode select screen, go to "Search" on the friend screen, and select "Players Recently Matched With."

Saving
Saving is done automatically. If you exit the game or turn off the power during saving, the save data may become corrupted. Please return to the title screen before exiting the app.

Time Settings
This app retrieves time by communicating with the server. If the time on your device differs from the server time, you may not be able to play. It is recommended to set the date and time to automatic in general settings. Please be aware of this before downloading.

Others
Rules and texts of this app may be changed without notice.

Request
For any issues, please contact us via our company website or the "Contact Us" section in the game. Posting in reviews may not provide enough information for us to address the issue. We strive to incorporate customer feedback to make the game more enjoyable, so we appreciate your cooperation.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not suitable for all ages.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.4ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5 2.8Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 600 Series GPU or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
